Function for info about current R session

session_info.Rd

Function for info about current R session

Usage

session_info(
  r_version = getRversion(),
  system = paste(c(Sys.info()["sysname"], Sys.info()["release"], "-",
    Sys.info()["version"]), collapse = " "),
  user = Sys.getenv("USERNAME"),
  machine = Sys.getenv("COMPUTERNAME"),
  time = format(Sys.time(), "%Y/%m/%d - %X"),
  libs = .libPaths(),
  env_obj = ls(all.names = T, envir = globalenv()),
  sep = paste0("\n", paste0(rep("=", 60), collapse = ""), "\n"),
  limit = 12
)

Arguments

r_version

R version

system

OS

user

User name

machine

Computer name

time

time

libs

Libs folder

env_obj

Objects in the environment

sep

Separator

limit

position to start text next to the parameters

Examples

session_info()
#> 
#> ============================================================
#> R Version: 4.4.2
#> System:    Windows 10 x64 - build 19045
#> User:      luisg
#> Machine:   DESKTOP-R383IKG
#> Time:      2024/12/14 - 21:53:08
#> ============================================================
#> Lib folders:
#> 	C:/Users/luisg/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpKos2Xb/temp_libpath20901b75211f
#> 	C:/Users/luisg/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpKos2Xb/temp_libpath209030467ca
#> 	C:/Users/luisg/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.4
#> 	C:/Program Files/R/R-4.4.2/library
#> ============================================================
#> Global Env Objects:
#> 	.Random.seed
#> ============================================================
#>
